mapper.update: update itrip_image set type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, targetId = #{targetid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, position = #{position,jdbcType=INTEGER}, imgUrl = #{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creationDate = #{creationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createdBy = #{createdby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modifyDate = #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifiedBy = #{modifiedby,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, type, targetId, position, imgUrl, creationDate, createdBy, modifyDate, modifiedBy from itrip_image where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, type, targetId, position, imgUrl, creationDate, createdBy, modifyDate, modifiedBy from itrip_image
